We’ve tried various things to narrow down the issue, but haven’t been able to fix it. It is currently spitting out the coral whenever the wrist moves. The robot has a wrist motor, and an intake/outtake motor. Based on testing, we think that it is connected to the wrist, and not to the coral wheel. The motor is moving sporadically, but we can still control it manually when the wrist is not moving.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eIf anyone knows what to do, help would be much appreciated!\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://github.com/BenjaminPassino/2025-Competition-Code/tree/main/src/main/java/frc/robot\" rel=\"noopener nofollow ugc\"\u003eOur
